subject: Self Care
title: Caffeine's Hidden Half-Life
description: A short lesson to help you apply Caffeine's Hidden Half-Life.

hook.text: That 2 PM coffee is still half-active in your bloodstream at 8 PM. It's sabotaging sleep for hours.

buildup.text: Caffeine's half-life is five to six hours. After ten hours, a quarter of it still blocks sleep signals.

discovery.text: Caffeine works by blocking adenosine, the chemical that builds sleep pressure throughout the day.

twist.text: You may fall asleep fine, but caffeine still reduces deep sleep by up to 20% without you noticing.

climax.text: Set a caffeine curfew at noon or 1 PM. Your evening self will thank your morning self profoundly.

punchline.text: Coffee after noon steals sleep you'll never notice.
